title: Antietam National Battlefield: Traveling Trunks
body: Traveling Trunks      Traveling Trunk    Antietam National Battlefield offers a "Life of a Civil War Soldier" travelling trunk designed for students in grades 3-6. Please contact us at 301-432-5124 or by email to reserve the trunk. The trunk is free to use.We do request that teachers pick it up in person and that they keep it no longer than two weeks.
